Parameter.Name: Target Variable
Parameter.Whatis: The scalar variable to apply the flux computation to. Default is Temperature.

Parameter.Name: Flux Coefficient
Parameter.Whatis: The name of the material parameter used to multiply the gradient in flux computation. Default is Heat Conductivity.

Parameter.Name: Calculate Grad
Parameter.Whatis: Calculate the gradient of the scalar field.

Parameter.Name: Calculate Grad Magnitude
Parameter.Whatis: Calculate the magnitude of the gradient of the scalar field.

Parameter.Name: Calculate Flux
Parameter.Whatis: Calculate the flux of the scalar field.

Parameter.Name: Calculate Flux Magnitude
Parameter.Whatis: Calculate the magnitude of the flux of the scalar field.

Parameter.Name: Enforce Positive Magnitude
Parameter.Whatis: In magnitude computation use an dirty a posteriori fix to get rid of negative magnitude values.
